text: Rives-d'Autise is a commune. It is found in the region Pays de la Loire in the Vendée department in the west of France. The municipality was created on 1 January 2019 and consists of the former communes of Nieul-sur-l'Autise (the seat) and Oulmes.Arrêté préfectoral 4 December 2018 == References == Category:2019 establishments in France Category:Communes in Vendée
title: Rives-d'Autise
